data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Token Pack 31 - Frozen Adventurers
data.detailed_description:
Jans Token Pack 31 - Frozen Adventurers

When winter is coming, you better put on some warm clothing! These tokens are fully prepared for even the most frozen adventures that you can offer them.
We have characters that are wearing fur clothing, inspired by cultures that live and have lived in the most northern parts of our world.
Other characters are wearing armor and clothing inspired by nomadic folk that live on the steppes and in the mountains.
And ofcourse I have included some vikings that are inspired by history and the more recent fantasy representations.
There are 12 unique tokens with a total of 58 variations.
Tokens included are:
  • Hide Armor Male & Female
  • Scale Armor Male & Female
  • Wizard Male & Female
  • Viking Noble Male & Female
  • Viking Warrior Male & Female
  • Hide Armor Halfling Female
  • Hide Armor Dwarf Male
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jan Loos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
